title: Classroom Space Utilization and Data-Driven Scientific Inquiry Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific experimental methods and experience with data visualization tools
context.additional_context: Application of Space Utilization Analysis and Feedback System Using Indoor Position Tracking Data in BYOD Environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze indoor location data to explain their class participation patterns and classroom space utilization efficiency
Learners can use data visualization tools to evaluate the impact of spatial arrangements in the experimental design process
Learners can compare their space utilization patterns with peers and propose improvements for collaborative learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
